pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing Dendrometer Data // Various functions to import, verify, process and plot high-resolution dendrometer data using daily and stem-cycle approaches as described in Deslauriers et al, 2007 doi:10.1016/j.dendro.2007.05.003. For more details about the package please see: Van der Maaten et al. 2016 doi:10.1016/j.dendro.2016.06.001.
